hHeroBannerTitle: Official waitlist for Indonesia's proposed 5 year tax-free visa
hHeroBannerSubTitle: Find meaningful work-life balance, deeper human connection, and positive environmental impact in Indonesia
hHeroBannerDescription: Join the waitlist for yourself or your company today
txtAboutPartner: to Indonesia's Ministry of Tourism and Creative Economy for the proposed tax-free digital nomad visa program waitlist.
hSavingsCalculatorSubTitle: Spend all the money you save living your best life in a tropical paradise
hSavingsCalculatoSubTitleDescription: Use our Nomad Savings Calculator to see how much money you can save monthly, yearly & over 5 years living & working in Indonesia
lblWaitlistBenefit1Description: Go into the priority queue for the proposed 5 year tax-free visa. After you join, refer a friend to move up the queue!
lblWaitlistBenefit2Description: You can get discounts on eco-friendly activities and services to get you set up in Indonesia stress-free.
